timing_objection.objection: We're not ready to move forward right now

Is it budget allocation, internal resource availability, completion of prior experiments, or something else? [LISTEN] Here's what I'd suggest: let's use this time productively. We could [CONDUCT PRELIMINARY FEASIBILITY ASSESSMENT / REVIEW YOUR DATA / DEVELOP DETAILED PROPOSAL] so that when you are ready, we can move immediately rather than starting the conversation from scratch. scope_uncertainty_objection.objection: We're not sure exactly what we need yet

This is common when you're at the edge of what's been done before. What if we structured this in phases? Phase 1 could be a feasibility assessment where we [SPECIFIC EXPLORATORY WORK] to determine the optimal path forward.
